item.description:
This Martial Arts Meetup is for local martial arts practitioners of any and all styles to get together and practice in a non-school or dojo free setting. The idea will be to learn and teach each other without consideration given to rank or style.

We will be using the facility provided by Together in Motion located at 1 Broadway in Arlington. The practice area is on a padded sprung floor.

This meetup is hosted by Not-Me!, Inc. For more information on Not-Me! please visit our website. For questions, please email erik@not-me.org.Not-Me!, Inc.

group.name: The Arlington Martial Arts Meetup Group

item.name: The Arlington Martial Arts March Meetup
